extendedInfo.description: You like Whales? Then you will like this app. You have several choices of songs of Whales that you can use to sleep better and faster. You can use the songs of Whales to relax when you're stressed. You can use to put your babe to sleep. The songs are soft ideal for the kids and adults to sleep faster.Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the sounds and relax or sleep better.Train your concentration and relax listening to the sound. Choose a time and not think about anything until the sound ends. Should gradually increase the time to increase the concentration.1. You can choose the time to play music.2. You can choose the background.3. You can choose the music.4. Beautiful backgrounds.5. The best relaxing sound!6. Music for sleep.7. Sound for babies sleep.8. You can put a nice sound to calm your baby and sleep like an angel.9. Great quality of the sounds.10. Beautiful sounds.Whales information as quoted from Wikipedia:Whale is the common name for various marine mammals of the order Cetacea. The term whale sometimes refers to all cetaceans, but more often it excludes dolphins and porpoises, which belong to the suborder Odontoceti (toothed whales). This suborder also includes the sperm whale, killer whale, pilot whale, and beluga whale. The other Cetacean suborder, Mysticeti (baleen whales), comprises filter feeders that eat small organisms caught by straining seawater through a comblike structure found in the mouth called baleen. This suborder includes the blue whale, the humpback whale, the bowhead whale and the minke whale. All cetaceans have forelimbs modified as fins, a tail with horizontal flukes, and nasal openings (blowholes) on top of the head.Whales range in size from the blue whale, the largest animal known to have ever existed at 30 m (98 ft) and 180 tonnes (180 long tons; 200 short tons), to various pygmy species, such as the pygmy sperm whale at 3.5 m (11 ft). Whales collectively inhabit all the world's oceans and number in the millions.Some species, such as the humpback whale, communicate using melodic sounds, known as whale song. These sounds can be extremely loud, depending on the species. Sperm whales have only been heard making clicks, while toothed whales (Odontoceti) use echolocation that can generate about 20,000 watts of sound (+73 dBm or +43 dBw) and be heard for many miles. Whale vocalization is likely to serve many purposes, including echolocation, mating, and identification.Whales, dolphins, sounds, photos, animals, aquatic, wet,  orca, dolphins, music, relaxing, ocean, sea, fish, whale.

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Amazing! But I wish the whales on the screen could move I think it would make this app out standing. It would really make you feel like you were there with them please consider this!
reviews.author: Jodie Wehbe

reviews.comment: Very nice app.  Perfect for accompanying you during a nap,  or during any other activity that\'s tranquil. I don\'t much care for the Dolphins to sleep app,  which is like being right next to a playground,  but like this one a lot.
reviews.author: Michael Nelson

reviews.title: Whale Songs To Sleep
reviews.comment: Absolutly crisp, clear, clean underwater songs from our Whale Friends. Will certainly help you relax and drift off  gently sleep! Wonderfully done...Brilliant and I am THANKFUL.  :-D   Sweet Dreams everyone!
reviews.author: Marla Solowey

reviews.title: Whale songs
reviews.comment: I really liked this. Its the best one i\'be heard that is realistic and doesn\'t sound like a recording. It has a clean sound.
reviews.author: Rhonda Duarte

reviews.title: So sweeeet\342\231\245
reviews.comment: I am in love\342\231\245 if only more soft deep relaxing music with those lovely hypnotysing whales sound and it will be fireworks!
reviews.author: Ayesha Shaheen

reviews.title: Very soothing
reviews.comment: I love this, simple but exactly what I was looking for. Great for people who have trouble sleeping.
reviews.author: Talia Colbert

reviews.title: loved these beautiful sounds sooo relaxing
reviews.comment: loved these sounds sooo relaxing
reviews.author: Lois Knight

reviews.title: Beautiful! Relaxing!
reviews.comment: Lovely!  Beautiful! Relaxing!
reviews.author: Morbid Kitty

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: I love whales and there sounds, but there is only one song with background music, while the whales are singing. You should make them all like that, or @ least half. It would be more relaxing, in my opinion. Otherwise, the sounds and scenery are beautiful!
reviews.author: Nickijo Eichorn

reviews.title: Seriously...
reviews.comment: So I decided to meditate, but I\'ve had a horrible time finding an app that played soothing music that was simple and had the timer bell AND didn\'t have a wierd person telling me what to do AND didn\'t have some crazy bell telling me when to breathe. I saw the whale sounds app and thought, I like whales, y not. Seriously, the whale w the music is what I meditate to now. I love this app, thanks for saving me from the stupid bells
reviews.author: Erin Bouton

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: I listen every night and makes me feel so relaxed. Just wish i could play all the tracks in one play.
reviews.author: Paul Grace

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I wish there were more tracks with music. The first song is my go to song at bedtime.
reviews.author: Gen Eisan

reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
reviews.comment: It really helps me sleep. Like I am on a boat in the middle of ocean at night surrounding by whales. So quiet and peaceful.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The best app I have ever downloaded. I have always enjoyed the sounds of whales, and to be able to listen to them continuously, till I fall asleep, is wonderful!! Great job with this one.
reviews.author: Jeanette Gonzalez

reviews.title: Sg3
reviews.comment: Every time I play a song on my phone it stops after ten seconds I have to start it again then no worries.  If this is fixed I would give 5 stars.
reviews.author: Renee vandenbosch

reviews.title: Glitchy but good
reviews.comment: I like the music it\'s very relaxing, however there seems to be a glitch where there is no way to stop the music without having to restart your phone. It\'s annoying.
reviews.author: Shannon Stephens

reviews.title: Relaxing whale song
reviews.comment: Clear, crisp and really chillaxing! Even lulled my hyper 7 month old pup to sleep! Love this app!
reviews.author: Sellma Baps

reviews.title: Out of this world
reviews.comment: This app has got to be the best ive ever got,  not only is the whale beautiful, their singing makes you feel so relaxed, truely an amazing experience to listen.
reviews.author: Diane Rennie

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I fall asleep to whale song every night. The songs on this app are extremely relaxing
reviews.author: Michael Sanderson

reviews.title: Great relaxation
reviews.comment: Nicely done to create balance in mind and body
reviews.author: Tonny Mustika
